description: Carter, Jimmy, 1924- -- Photographs; Rabin, Yitzhak, 1922-1995 -- Photographs
label: Former US President of State Jimmy Carted who is visiting Israel, met with Defence Minister Itzhak Rabin and other IDF officers from whom he receive the facts on the present problems in the occupied territories.
